sourcesContent:
<template>

</template>

<script>
import {ref, watch} from "vue";

export default {
  name: "Status_panel",
  props: ['dataObject', 'canUpdate'],
  emits: ['subscribeFields', 'updateData'],

  setup(props, {emit}) {
    let dataObject = ref({})

    let requiredFields = {
      motor_1_current: "fcu/bridge_motor/motor_1_current",
      motor_2_current: "fcu/bridge_motor/motor_2_current",
      main_sts: "main_position_motor/txpdo_1/statusword",
      back_sts: "back_position_motor/txpdo_1/statusword",
      lat_sts: "lat_position_motor/txpdo_1/statusword",
      fcu_sts: "fcu/status_01/general_status",
      imu_sts: "imu/status_01/general_status",
      battery_current: "battery/pack_info/current",
      battery_status: "battery/pack_info/status",
      height_sensor_sts: "fcu/height_sensor/height_sensor_status",
      cockpit_speed_command: "cockpit_arduino/pilot_command_01/speedcommand",
    }

    emit("subscribeFields", requiredFields)

    setInterval( ()=>{
      console.log("can update")
      console.log(props.canUpdate)
      if (props.canUpdate) {
        emit("updateData", requiredFields, dataObject)
      }
    } , 1000 )

    return {}
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
